column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////In regards to our bok choy
column2: we prepare fresh bok choy every morning before lunch service
column3: and once more before dinner service. And the chashu we add to our ramen bowls is measured in weight; therefore
column4: the size or length of the chashu pieces are not considered when preparing our bowls. I hope this provides some insight. We look forward to hearing from you.
